item.title: Amid heavy rain, flood situation grim in Ballari and Raichur
item.description: <![CDATA[Raichur/Ballari: This year's monsoon season brought exceptionally heavy rainfall to Ballari and Raichur districts, areas typically known for their scorching heat.Ballari witnessed its highest Aug rainfall in three years, receiving 10.4cm over 19 days â€” more than double the average of 4.9cm. The district recorded only 0.9cm of rainfall in 2023, leading to a drought situation, while during the same period last year, it received an average of 6.9cm.The excessive rainfall has caused streams and lake...]]>
item.author: Tnn
